title: The Young Philadelphians
extract: The Young Philadelphians is a 1959 American legal drama film directed by Vincent Sherman and starring Paul Newman, Barbara Rush, Robert Vaughn and Alexis Smith. The film is based on the 1956 novel The Philadelphian, by Richard P. Powell.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
extract: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont, based on the 1982 Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption.

title: Inception
extract: Inception is a 2010 science fiction action film written and directed by Christopher Nolan. The film follows a skilled thief who steals secrets from within the subconscious during the dream state.

title: Parasite
extract: Parasite is a 2019 South Korean black comedy thriller film directed by Bong Joon-ho. The story revolves around two families from different socioeconomic backgrounds.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
extract: Everything Everywhere All at Once is a 2022 American absurdist action-science fiction comedy-drama film written and directed by Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert.

title: Dune
extract: Dune is a 2021 epic science fiction film directed by Denis Villeneuve, based on the 1965 novel by Frank Herbert. It follows Paul Atreides, a young nobleman whose family becomes embroiled in a war for control of the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Batman
extract: The Batman is a 2022 superhero film directed by Matt Reeves, featuring Batman in a gritty reimagining of Gotham City and his pursuit of a serial killer known as The Riddler.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
extract: Spider-Man: No Way Home is a 2021 superhero film directed by Jon Watts, featuring Spider-Man as he deals with the fallout of his identity being revealed.
